raw_comment: I am sick and tired of hearing about the Ivy League. For the last 47 years, I have taught at one of the top public unis in the world and I have had grad students from the Ivy League. Their privilege has been nauseating. They have had so many things handed to them and can not work well in health care. On average, they have been sheltered and can not tolerate stress well. I find it especially amusing that Duke, or Fluke, is mentioned here. Many of their faculty live hand to mouth, on grant funding. The school is so cheap, it will not even pay their salaries. It breeds an unhealthy environment, to say nothing of  insufferable humidity.
ace_sentences: I am sick and tired of hearing about the Ivy League.
For the last 47 years, I have taught at a top public university in the world.
I have had graduate students from the Ivy League.
I think that the privilege of these students has been nauseating.
I think that many things have been handed to these students.
I think that these students cannot work well in health care.
On average, I think that these students have been sheltered.
On average, I think that these students cannot tolerate stress well.
Many faculty of Duke live hand to mouth on grant funding.
I think that Duke is cheap.
I think that Duke will not even pay the salaries of its faculty.
I think that Duke breeds an unhealthy environment.
